title: Raunchy Ex
description: One second you're on stage as the biggest rock star in the world. The next second you're accused of murder.Of course I'm innocent. There was an accident in my hotel room and now I'm on the hook...You think that would be the worst part of this story, right?Wrong.The high profile lawyer our band manager hires walks into the room to meet me... and who is at his side?The only woman I ever loved. The woman who knew me before I was a rock star. The woman wearing a diamond ring not from me.It's obvious I can't go near her... or is it?If I make the move I've been dreaming of making for years, my scumbag lawyer will walk and I'll be in jail.How much is a kiss from my sweet Melanie worth?You're about to find out.
author: Jaxson Kidman
